mapper.update: update city as cn set cn.logic_delete_flg = 'removed' where cn.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update city
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country_code = #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
population = #{population,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where logic_delete_flg = 'visible' and id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select cn.id , cn.name , cn.country_code , cty.continent , cty.name as nation , cn.district , cn.population from city as cn inner join country as cty on cty.code = cn.country_code where cn.delete_flg = 'visible' and cn.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select cn.id , cn.name , cn.country_code , cty.continent , cty.name as nation , cn.district , cn.population from city as cn inner join country as cty on cty.code = cn.country_code where cn.delete_flg = 'visible' order by cn.population desc limit #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}
